title: Oracle from One Night Ultimate Werewolf

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- From Night 2 to 5 (chose at random), the host will tell you to pick a number from 1 to 10. At the beginning of this night, town is told *"Oracle wake up, and choose a number from 1 to 10."*
- [Choose two players to rampage at their house.]

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you choose the correct number, you gain access to every channel in the current game while you are alive.
- If you chose correct, at the beginning of the day town is told, *"You guessed correct! You may keep your eyes open for the rest of the night."*
- If you choose the wrong number, your traits and abilities switch to the ones in brackets, and every non-Neutral Benign role's goal changes to: *Kill the Oracle.*
- If this happens, at the beginning of the next day town is told, *"You are clearly a terrible Oracle! Everybody, your new goal is to vote the Oracle!"*
- If you guess incorrectly, everybody wins when you die. The only exception are Neutral Benign's which only win if they met their win condition.
